Posts.Content: I had a terrible cough which started during Radiotherapy I was sent for a CT scan which thankfully was clear, was given antibiotics forward 2 month I started to cough again, went back to my gp yesterday have been given a course of steriods I do have asthma although never needed my inhaler for ages so Im back using them x Hope ur inhalers help x
Posts.Title: wheezing and inhalers

Posts.Content: Hiya looking for a wee bit advice finished treatment Dec 2014 on Tamoxifen for 5 yrsÂ  finding the sweats hard to deal with, in the last couple of weeks Ive notice my face is all blotchy I thought it might have been the sweats as Im having them alot, but over the last couple of days Ive noticed my face has got worse I have been out hanging the washing no sweat came in and I look like Im all sunburnt Any advice?
Posts.Title: My FACE!!!
